project1.title: Robo Romp: Revenge of the Bot!
project1.description: Frontend Capstone for NSS. A total overhaul of Robo Romp 1.0. Compete against your friends online, find out who the real champion is! Not for the feint of heart!
project1.technologiesUsed: React, JavaScript, Webpack, Firebase, Bttn.css, Animate.css, and Version Control with Github

project2.title: Robo Romp 1.0
project2.description: A code challenge to learn JS prototypal inheritance turned side project. Duke it out against a friend in a Mortal Kombat themed robot frenzy!
project2.technologiesUsed: Prototypal JS, jQuery, Local AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, Animate.css, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Local Weather
project3.description: An assignment that mixed the excitement of weather forecasts, API's and Firebase authentication. Hold onto your hats!
project3.technologiesUsed: OpenWeather API, Firebase, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Chatter Cheese
project4.description: A group project to showcase our skills after three months at the Nashville Software School. Colorful language strongly encouraged.
project4.technologiesUsed: First project with modular JS, jQuery, Local AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, Version Control with Github
